sentences.en: Are you working late (= working after the time you usually finish ) again tonight?
sentences.cn: 你今晚又要加班吗？

sentences.en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
sentences.cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

sentences.en: Faculty members complain that their students are unprepared to do college-level work.
sentences.cn: 学院的老师们抱怨说他们的学生还很不适应大学的课业。

sentences.en: Forty police officers are working round the clock (= working day and night without stopping ) to find Murray’s killer.
sentences.cn: 为了找出杀害默里的凶手，40名警察正日夜工作。

sentences.en: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.cn: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.en: I spent lots of money on smart new outfits for work.
sentences.cn: 我花大笔钱购置了上班时穿的漂亮新套装。

sentences.en: it was the work of a moment to discover the tiny stab wound.
sentences.cn: 一会就能找出那刺破的小伤口。

sentences.en: Many young people in the area have never worked.
sentences.cn: 该地区的许多年轻人从未工作过。

sentences.en: Mark was condemned to do most of the work.
sentences.cn: 马克被迫承担大部分工作。

sentences.en: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.cn: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

sentences.en: Nowadays, many people are able to work from home.
sentences.cn: 如今，很多人可以在家工作。

sentences.en: one of those gimmicks for working off aggression.
sentences.cn: 消除侵略的花招之一。

sentences.en: Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.cn: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

sentences.en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentences.cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentences.en: People will work themselves up into a state about anything.
sentences.cn: 人们总会沉不住气，为任何事感到担忧。

sentences.en: Sally isn’t working tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 萨莉明天不上班。

sentences.en: Send a resume and examples of your work.
sentences.cn: 请寄一份履历及你所做的样品。

sentences.en: she set a coiffeur to work his will on her hair.
sentences.cn: 她让男发型师任意打理她的头发。

sentences.en: she set a coiffeur to work his will on her hair.
sentences.cn: 她让男发型师任意打理她的头发。

sentences.en: She went for a brisk walk to work off her frustration.
sentences.cn: 她快步走了一会儿，以排解心中的沮丧。

sentences.en: Staff will have to get used to a new way of working.
sentences.cn: 员工必须适应新的工作方式。

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: The building is the work of architect Rafael Moneo.
sentences.cn: 这幢大楼是建筑师拉斐尔•莫内欧的作品。

sentences.en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentences.cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

sentences.en: The injury means he’ll probably never work again.
sentences.cn: 这伤意味着他很有可能再也不能工作了。

sentences.en: The price depends on the intricacy of the work.
sentences.cn: 价格取决于做工的复杂精细度。

sentences.en: The standard of work has declined.
sentences.cn: 作品的水准下降了。

sentences.en: The teacher should make sure that each child has a piece of work displayed on the wall.
sentences.cn: 老师应该确保每个孩子都有一幅作品挂在墙上展示。

sentences.en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentences.cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentences.en: There is a wry sense of humour in his work.
sentences.cn: 他的作品带有一种讽刺意味的幽默。

sentences.en: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.cn: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.en: These days work plays an important part in a single woman's life.
sentences.cn: 现在，工作在单身女性的生活中起着重要作用。

sentences.en: We’re sometimes expected to work twelve-hour days.
sentences.cn: 我们有时候需要一天工作12小时。

sentences.en: Where do you work?
sentences.cn: 你在哪里上班？

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

words.tran_cn: 切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的
工作日的；日常的；普通的，平凡的
日常的，工作日的；平凡的
专心工作的人；醉心于工作的人；为免遭辞退而工作过份卖力的人
工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 从中捣乱的人；破坏计划的人（或事）

phrases.phrase: give someone the works informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 让某人吃苦头，折磨某人
良好的工作；干得好；做得很棒
面临艰巨的任务；十分忙碌
正在准备阶段；在进行中或准备中
adv. 有工作；在完成之中

phrases.phrase: set to work (或 set someone to work)

phrases.tran_cn: 社会福利工作（等于social service）
配合，协力；工作小组；协同工作
工作效率；劳动效率；加工效率
影响，对…起作用；继续工作；从事于…；设法说服

phrases.phrase: work one's ass (或 butt 等) off
work one's fingers to the bone
work one's way through university (或 college 等)
phrases.tran_cn: 打工挣钱读完大学，勤工俭学读完大学
解决；算出；实现；制定出；消耗完；弄懂
(主英)故意死扣规章而减低生产效率，变相怠工

trans.tran_cn: 工作，职业，职责，工作地点，劳动，作品，作为，修建，工厂
trans.tran_en: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money
to do a job that you are paid for

trans.tran_cn: （使）工作，干活，从事…工作，用功，争取，管理，就职，研究，帮助，（使）运转/行，（使）奏效，起作用
trans.tran_en: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job
